article.title: Health
article.text:
Health


♞ 1、Cardiovascular more stable, lower blood pressure, lower cholesterol. Kiss will make people heart rate, blood circulation improves the body carefree oxygen levels. Adrenal hormones also cause high blood pressure, high cholesterol, insomnia, muscle atrophy, and the culprit, but kissing can prevent the formation of adrenal hormones.
♞ 2、Exercise lung capacity. We often take a deep breath before the kiss, and then slowly exhaled air kiss during the alveoli do not consciously make a deep breath, improves oxygen supply to the alveoli, exercise vital capacity.
♞ 3、Reduce the risk of stomach problems, blood disease odds. Those who regularly kissing chance in the stomach, bladder and blood systems of illness will be smaller.
